Name: :ref:`isDefined(T|Unit): Boolean <03_ride-language/03_functions:isDefined(T|Unit): Boolean>`
Description: "Checks if an argument is not unit"

Name: :ref:`value(T|Unit): T <03_ride-language/03_functions:value(T|Unit): T>`

Name: :ref:`valueOrElse(T|Unit, T): T <03_ride-language/03_functions:valueOrElse(T|Unit, T): T>`

Name: :ref:`valueOrErrorMessage(T|Unit, String): T <03_ride-language/03_functions:valueOrErrorMessage(T|Unit, String): T>`
Description: "Gets a value from a union type argument if it's not unit. Otherwise
